attributes.action: Increase the minimum sentence for knife crime
attributes.additional_details: We believe that by increasing crime sentences -involving knife crime- it will help create a safer yet secure environment and hopefully impact the abolishment of knife crime or use.
attributes.background: We want parliament to increase all knife crime sentences and overall any particular crime involving knife crime.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Minimum 5-year sentence for knife possession and 10-years for use of a knife: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595601

Minimum sentences and mandatory licensing for carrying a knife: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602388
